subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda was perceived as a back-of-the-rotation commodity for the Yankees. He has evolved into a consistent pitcher, allowing four hits and one run in Sunday’s win over the Red Sox.
snippet: Hiroki Kuroda was perceived as a back-of-the-rotation commodity for the Yankees. He has evolved into a consistent pitcher, allowing four hits and one run in Sunday’s win over the Red Sox.
